description:
http://anidb.net/ch3660 [Suzuhara Misaki] is a sixth grader who has just moved to Tokyo to live with her aunt. She stumbles across a merchandising phenomenon known as Angelic Layer in which a person can purchase a doll and custom design it. Once their doll is finished, they can link to it through new technology and have it move however they want, as long as its within the confines of a field known as a layer. In these fields there are battles to see who is the best at Angelic Layer that occur at tourist traps or at special tournaments; Misaki meets a strange man known only as http://anidb.net/ch5369 [Icchan] who gets her involved in the games. The man for some reason believes that she has high potential to become one of the greatest players of all time...
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
Misaki moves to Tokyo to live with her aunt. After getting lost at the train station she sees an Angelic Fight on a big screen. A mysterious man, Icchan, who followed her out of the train station tells her more about `Angelic Layer` and helps her to create her own angel, Hikaru.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Enchantée ! C`est mon ange à moi.
Hajimemashite! Watashi Dake no Angel
Hallo wie gehts? Mein eigener Angel!
How Do You Do? My Very Own Angel
Prazer Em Conhecê-la! Seja Meu Único Angel!
はじめまして! 私だけのエンジェル

REGULAR.description:
Misaki gets confused on her way to the first day of school when she meets Hatoko, a 5 year old girl who knows a lot about Angelic Layer. She also meets Hatoko`s older brother, Kotarou and his best friend Tamayo. On her way home from school Misaki once again meets Icchan who helps her to make clothes for Hikaru and brings her to an Angelic Layer training center so she can practice movements on the Layer... However Misaki accidentally signs up for a match!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Courage Hikaru pour ton premier combat !
Ganbare Hikaru! Hajimete no Fight!!
Let`s Try Our Best, Hikaru! The First Fight
Tu dein Bestes, Hikaru! Heute ist dein erster Kampf!
Vamos Lá Hikaru! A Primeira Batalha!
がんばれヒカル! はじめてのファイト!!

REGULAR.description:
Icchan continues teaching Misaki about Angelic Layer and helps her practice. Misaki meets Ohjiro Mihara and his angel, Wizard. Icchan gets Misaki an Angel Card and signs her up for the tournament.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Anata wa Dare? Misaki no Doki-doki Lesson
Quem é Você?! A Lição Emocionante De Misaki!
Qui est-tu ? L`expérience palpitante de Misaki.
Wer bist du? Eine Lektion in Nervenstärke
Who Are You? Misaki`s Heart-Pounding Lesson
あなたは誰? みさきのドキドキレッスン

REGULAR.description:
Misaki`s first official tournament begins as she faces off with Angel Katalina, an Angel that uses ice skates in her special attacks. We also get to see Hatoko`s famous Angel, Lightspeed Suzuka, in action.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Der Tag, an dem ein Engel herabschwebte
O Dia Que O Anjo Desceu!
Tenshi ga Maiorita Hi
The Day the Angel Descended
Un ange tombé du ciel.
天使が舞いおりた日

REGULAR.description:
The Tokyo Regional Qualifiers continues as Misaki fights in her second match. Hatako is disappointed in Misaki for not believing in Hikaru.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Eu Não Quero Perder! Estou Acreditando Em Hikaru!
I Don`t Want to Lose! Please Believe in Hikaru
Ich will nicht verlieren - Ich glaube an dich, Hikaru
Je ne veux pas perdre. Je crois en Hikaru...
Maketakunai! Hikaru o Shinjite...
負けたくない! ヒカルを信じて...

REGULAR.description:
The Tokyo Regional Qualifiers continue. We get to see small portions of some of Misaki`s fights. Misaki ends up having to fight Hatako. Hatako asks Misaki to promise not to lose to anyone but her and meet at the Kanto Games.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Die blitzschnelle Suzuka - Hatokos Kampfansage
Kousoku no Suzuka! Hatoko no Rival Sengen!!
Quel défi ! Un combat avec Hatoko.
Suzuka, A Velocidade Da Luz! Declaração De Rivalidade De Hatoko!
The Light-Speed Suzuka! Hatoko`s Declaration of Rivalry
光速の鈴鹿! 鳩子のライバル宣言!!

REGULAR.description:
Misaki fights her last match in the Tokyo Regional Qualifiers. Both Misaki and her opponent discover the fun of playing Angelic Layer, even while competing. The Angels advancing to the Kanto Games are announced.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Auf Messers Schneide - Misakis letzte Chance
Fight to the Limit... Misaki`s Last Chance
Giri-giri no Tatakai... Misaki no Last Chance
Lutando No Limite...! Última Chance De Misaki!
Un combat difficile ! La dernière chance de Misaki.
ギリギリの戦い... みさきのラストチャンス

REGULAR.description:
Misaki`s classmate, Ryo Misaki claims that girls can`t beat boys at Angelic Layer if the fight is "fair". Eventually they end up having a match.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Misaki Vs Misaki?! Um Perigoso Colega De Classe!
Misaki contre Misaki. Une camarade dangereuse.
Misaki gegen Misaki - Ein gefährlicher Mitschüler
Misaki vs Misaki? Kiken na Classmate
Misaki vs Misaki? The Dangerous Classmate
みさき vs ミサキ? 危険な同級生[クラスメイト]

REGULAR.description:
The Kanto Area Qualifiers start, it is a single elimination tournament leading up to the National Games. Misaki fights in the very first match versus the idol, Ringo Seto and her Angel, Ranga.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Cante, Misaki! O Deus É Um Ídolo?!
Chante Misaki ! L`adversaire est une star !
Sing Misaki! The Deus is an Idol
Sing, Misaki, sing! Der Deus ist ein Popidol!
Utae! Misaki - Deus wa Idol!?
歌え! みさき デウスはアイドル!?

REGULAR.description:
Misaki fights her second match in the Kanto Games. We see the Angels, Blanche and Shirahime for the first time. Misaki fights Madoka and her angel, Mao, but something is wrong. What is going on?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Des sœurs malveillantes ! Hikaru est visée.
Die fiesen Schwestern, Hikaru wird zum Ziel
Ijiwaru Shimai! Nerawareta Hikaru
Irmãs Malvadas! Hikaru É O Alvo!
The Mean Sisters! And the Targeted Hikaru
いじわる姉妹! 狙われたヒカル

REGULAR.description:
The fight against Mao continues. The Fujisaki sisters learn a valuable lesson about Angelic Layer. The semi-finalists are announced.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Acabe Com Ela! A Partida Decisiva De Hikaru E Mao!
Conclusion ! un combat important pour Hikaru et Mao.
Es wird ernst, Hikarus und Maos großer Kampf
Kecchaku! Hikaru to Mao no Shinkenshoubu
The Match! Hikaru and Mao`s Real Fight
決着! ヒカルとマオの真剣勝負

REGULAR.description:
Misaki worries about what Hikaru`s weak point is. Kotaro invites Misaki to watch him perform karate to try and help her out.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Misaki E Kotaro! Um Encontro Excitante!
Misaki and Kotaru - The Two`s Exciting Date
Misaki et Kotaro, le rendez-vous.
Misaki to Kotarou - Futari no Waku-waku Date
Misaki und Kotaro, ein aufregendes Date
みさきと虎太郎 ♡ 二人のわくわくデート

REGULAR.description:
We get a glimpse of Kaede`s home life and the origins of Blanche. The semi finals for the Kanto Games start and a new upgrade to the Layer is announced. Misaki and Hikaru face off versus Kaede and Blanche.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Branca E Pura Buranshe! O Sorriso De Kaede!
Blanche si pure. Le sourire de Kaede.
Blanche, Unschuld in Weiß - Kaedes Lächeln
Junpaku no Blanche - Kaede no Hohoemi
The Pure White Blanche - Kaede`s Smile
純白のブランシェ 楓のほほえみ

REGULAR.description:
Blanche`s Hyper Mode gives her more strength and speed than any other Angel Misaki has come across and she`s not giving Hikaru much of a chance. Just when it seems that all hope is lost, Misaki realizes that, not only are her friends and fans counting on her, but Hikaru is too. Will it be enough to help her win the match?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Akiramenai! Soshite Angel wa Umareta
Ich gebe nicht auf! Und ein neuer Angel ward geboren
Je n`abandonnerai pas et un ange est né.
Never Give Up! And Then an Angel was Born
Nunca Desistir! Um Angel Nasceu!
あきらめない! そして天使[エンジェル]は生まれた

REGULAR.description:
We learn some of the background of Sai and see hints of why she is involved in Angelic Layer. Sai and Shirahime face off versus Hatako and Suzuka. Who will win?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Hatoko contre Sai Jonouchi.
Shirahime Vs Suzuka! O Segredo Da Máquina De Gelo!
Shirahime gegen Suzuka! Das Geheimnis der Eismaschine
Shirahime vs Suzuka! Ice Machine no Himitsu
Shirahime vs Suzuka! The Ice Machine`s Secret
白姫 vs 鈴鹿! アイスマシーンの秘密

REGULAR.description:
We are given a glimpse into the real reason that Sai plays Angelic Layer. The final match of the Kanto Games commences.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Batalha Final! O Última Ataque De Hikaru!
Das große Finale! Hikarus letzter Angriff
Kesshousen! Hikaru no Last Attack
La finale ! la dernière attaque de Hikaru.
The Final Match! Hikaru`s Last Attack
決勝戦! ヒカルのラストアタック

REGULAR.description:
Misaki must pick a Second, who will support her at the National Games. Everyone shows up to a party at Misaki`s house. Misaki`s mother is supposed to show up, but will she?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Anata ni Kimeta! Misaki no Eranda Hito
Celui que Misaki a choisi.
Du sollst an meiner Seite sein! Misakis Auserwählter
Eu Escolho Você! A Escolha De Misakichi!
I Choose You! Misaki`s Chosen Person
あなたに決めた! ミサキの選んだヒト

REGULAR.description:
The National Games start. Sai fights the first match of the Games. Shu and Athena fight in the second match.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Kyouteki ga Ippai! Akogare no Zenkokutaikai
Les jeux nationaux, de nombreux adversaires.
Lots of Formidable Opponents! The Much Anticipated National Tournament
Muitos Oponentes Formidáveis! A Grandeza Do Torneio Nacional!
Viele starke Gegner! Die Landesmeisterschaft beginnt
強敵がいっぱい! あこがれの全国大会

REGULAR.description:
Misaki fights her first match against a Deus who is her physical opposite. A storm causes issues with the Layer.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: O Sistema Caiu?! Uma Batalha Na Tempestade!
System Down! Combat décisif sur un bateau en pleine tempête.
System Down!? Arashi no Senjou Kessen!
System Down? A Battle Onboard a Boat Amidst a Storm
Systemversagen! Entscheidungskampf auf stürmischer See
システムダウン!? 嵐の船上決戦!

REGULAR.description:
Misaki has a surprise opponent in the second round of the National Games.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Freund oder Feind? Die zwei Gesichter von Onkelchen Icchan
Icchan est-il un ennemi ? Un jeu étrange.
Icchan É O Meu Oponente?! O Confuso Segundo Round!
Teki wa Icchan? Tomadoi no Nikai Sen!
The Enemy is Icchan? The Stuttering Second Match
敵はいっちゃん? 戸惑いの二回戦!

REGULAR.description:
Misaki, Tamayo, Hatako and Kotaro go to the beach. The Angelic Layer development team also ends up at the same beach. Someone confesses their feelings, but will those feelings be returned?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: La mer en été ! Quelqu`un est amoureux de quelqu`un.
Natsu no umi! Dareka ga dareka ni koi shiteru
O Verão Na Praia! Quem Está Apaixonado Por Quem?!
Sonne, Sand und Meer! Jemand hat sich verliebt
The Summer Sea! Someone is in Love with Someone
夏の海! 誰かが誰かに恋してる

REGULAR.description:
Misaki runs into Ohjiro in town and they spend the day together. Kotaro and Tamayo get stuck in an elevator together. The next day Hikaru faces off against Wizard.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: De Repente Juntos E Sozinhos! O Segredo Do Encontro Duplo!
Double rendez-vous secret.
Suddenly Alone Together - The Secret Double Date
Totsuzen no Futari Kiri - Himitsu no Double Date
Und plötzlich sind wir ganz für uns! Zwei unverhoffte Rendezvous
突然の二人きり 秘密のダブルデート

REGULAR.description:
The fight continues between Hikaru and Wizard. Misaki must figure out how to break Wizard`s guard.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Break into the Magical Wall! Misaki vs Ohjiro
Durchbrich die magische Barriere! Misaki gegen Ohjiro
Fais tomber le mur magique ! Misaki contre Ojiro.
Mahou no Kabe o Yabure! Misaki vs Oujirou
Quebrando A Barreira Mágica! Misaki Vs Ohjiro!
魔法の壁を破れ! みさき vs 王二郎

REGULAR.description:
Chief Mihara takes a bold step. Athena faces off versus Shirahime in what promises to be an epic match.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Declaração Para Misaki! O Sentimento Sob O Arco-Íris!
Dis-le à Misaki ! Cette pensée traverse l`arc-en-ciel.
Greif nach dem Glück, Misaki! Die Erfüllung am Ende des Regenbogens
Misaki ni Todoke! Kono Omoi Niji o Koete
Reach Out to Misaki! This Feeling is Over the Rainbow
みさきに届け! この想い虹を越えて

REGULAR.description:
Misaki finally finds out where her mother has been and what she has been doing.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Fateful Reunion - An Angel Soaked with Tears
Reunião Familiar! Um Angel Ensopado De Lágrimas!
Réunies par le destin ! Des anges mouillés de larmes.
Schicksalhaftes Wiedersehen! Ein tränennasser Angel
Unmei no Saikai - Namida ni Nureta Angel
運命の再会 涙に濡れたエンジェル

REGULAR.description:
The long awaited championship match between Athena and Hikaru occurs.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Ailes de l`ange ! Guidez-nous Hikaru et moi !
Angels Wings! Pull Me and Hikaru Together
Mögen die Schwingen der Engel mich und Hikaru ans Ziel tragen!
Que As Asas De Um Anjo Guiem A Mim E A Hikaru!
Tenshi no Ysubasa yo! Watashi to Hikaru o Izanatte
天使の翼よ! 私とヒカルをいざなって

Ending 2
